text: If you don't take risks, you can't create a future.
author: Monkey D. Luffy (One Piece)

text: I will never lose again! Until I defeat him and become the world's greatest swordsman, I will never be defeated!
author: Roronoa Zoro (One Piece)

text: When do you think people die? When they are forgotten.
author: Dr. Hiluluk (One Piece)

text: Whatever happens, happens.
author: Spike Spiegel (Cowboy Bebop)

text: The net is vast and infinite.
author: Motoko Kusanagi (Ghost in the Shell)

text: I will become the god of the new world.
author: Light Yagami (Death Note)

text: I'll take a potato chip... and eat it!
author: Light Yagami (Death Note)

text: If the king doesn't move, then his subjects won't follow.
author: Lelouch vi Britannia (Code Geass)

text: Believe in the me that believes in you.
author: Kamina (Gurren Lagann)

text: I'm just a guy who's a hero for fun.
author: Saitama (One-Punch Man)

text: It's fine now. Why? Because I am here!
author: All Might (My Hero Academia)

text: I'm not gonna run away, I never go back on my word! That's my nindo: my ninja way.
author: Naruto Uzumaki (Naruto)

text: Those who break the rules are scum, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
author: Kakashi Hatake (Naruto)

text: People's lives don't end when they die, it ends when they lose faith.
author: Itachi Uchiha (Naruto)

text: A lesson without pain is meaningless. That's because you can't gain something without sacrificing something else.
author: Edward Elric (Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood)

text: Whatever you lose, you'll find it again. But what you throw away you'll never get back.
author: Kenshin Himura (Rurouni Kenshin)

text: The only thing we're allowed to do is to believe that we won't regret the choice we made.
author: Levi Ackerman (Attack on Titan)

text: This world is cruel, but it's also very beautiful.
author: Mikasa Ackerman (Attack on Titan)

text: If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win!
author: Eren Yeager (Attack on Titan)

text: Dedicate your hearts!
author: Erwin Smith (Attack on Titan)

text: No matter how many people you may lose, you have no choice but to go on living, no matter how devastating the blows may be.
author: Tanjiro Kamado (Demon Slayer)

text: Set your heart ablaze.
author: Kyojuro Rengoku (Demon Slayer)

text: Throughout heaven and earth, I alone am the honored one.
author: Satoru Gojo (Jujutsu Kaisen)

text: Surpass your limits. Right here. Right now.
author: Yami Sukehiro (Black Clover)

text: I will become the Wizard King!
author: Asta (Black Clover)
